Name: Thirty Two HardMod
About the game: Go on a little adventure with a yellow cube. This is a minimalistic platformer in which you have to collect coins on levels to get to the next level. In addition to the usual blocks on which you can walk and jump, you will come across dangerous blocks that can shoot or move in different directions. There may be thorns or lava underneath. Sharp saws can be in the air. There are 20 challenging levels in the game. Good luck to you.
